message: Starting API compatibility analysis - examining current system interfaces and dependencies
Analyzing service interfaces and creating comprehensive API mapping - identified singleton patterns and command flow interfaces
Designing comprehensive adapter patterns and compatibility layer architecture - agent limit reached, proceeding with integrated design
Implementing concrete adapter patterns and facade interfaces - creating PLCManagerAdapter, feature flag system, and migration coordinator

API COMPATIBILITY MISSION COMPLETE: Comprehensive API compatibility layer delivered with concrete adapter implementations, feature flag system, migration coordinator, and full backward compatibility framework enabling zero-downtime architectural transition
